Core-CSS

Lightweight, typography-focused CSS library

Getting Started

Lightweight

Under 15kb; typography, animation, inputs, buttons, links, sass utility functions

Typography-focused

Responsive, rhythmic typography built on defined, industry accepted ratios

Visually-accessible styles

Inputs, buttons, and links designed to be as visually accessible as possible
